sub_title: Grand Valley State University Information Technology
title: IT Services Technician
description: Collaborated with faculty and staff to understand their technology needs and provide appropriate solutions and support.#Provided technical support to faculty, staff, and students in troubleshooting and resolving technology-related issues.

title: Research Software Engineer
description: Winter 2024: Collaborated with Eli Review and GVSU faculty to design and implement an AI-powered writing feedback microservice using Cohere and Mistral LLMs. Integrated with AWS SQS for asynchronous processing and deployed on GPU-backed infrastructure to enhance automated writing assessment within learning platforms.#Fall 2024: Kicked off the Laker Mobile CI/CD Modernization Project. Tasked with automating iOS app build and deployment using Fastlane, integrating modern CI/CD workflows, and creating a developer onboarding tutorial for future student teams.
